alert.note: Alert for Lee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:15PM CDT until October 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ITAWAMBA AND EAST CENTRAL LEE COUNTIES... At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mantachie, or near Fulton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Mantachie, Clay, Abney, Cardsville, Mooreville, Dorsey, Jacinto and Ballardsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
